about_the_game:
A cell of the revolutionary group who call themselves ‘Los Desplazados’, including their leader Gloria, has gone missing in the Chicxulub Perpetual Energy Station area. Mexican-American ex-CIMACORP Agent ‘Tenoch Kaan’, now a Desplazado himself, is deployed to find Gloria and her team. He is fitted with the latest in biotechnological enhancements. His mission is to find out what happened to the missing Desplazados without alerting CIMACORP of his presence.

UNDETECTED is a top-down stealth game with a non-lethal-only approach to design.[/b]



  • Visibility Meter: Hide in the shadows and interact with the environment to create dark areas to sneak through. Be careful not to leave footprints.
  • Sound: Every footstep, surface, weapon and item can make a noise that will alert the enemy. Watch out for those puddles!
  • Possibilities: Tons of items, abilities, throwables, laser mines and hiding spots to infiltrate or fight off enemies. Every area is filled with opportunities.



  • Boss Fights that challenge your stealth and fighting skills. There are multiple ways to take down each boss - sneakily or directly!
  • Weird Arsenal of 4 bullet types and 8 explosives that can be thrown or planted. Each one has different effects on enemies, the environment and even yourself.
  • An Alert Mode that is tense but fair. Getting caught is not the end, but an opportunity to get creative.



  • Graphics that mix retro and modern techniques to bring boomer stealth into the future.
  • Improved mechanics that polish the top-down stealth experience. No more staring at a tiny radar for hours!

  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 580 or AMD HD 7870

short_description: Stealth your way through the shadows and uncover a corporate conspiracy. Become a cyber-augmented agent in this gameplay-focused stealth game that brings classic sneaking to the modern era.
